newsitem.title: UK: UK's FTSE 100 jumps to record close on back of Dow.
newsitem.headline: UK's FTSE 100 jumps to record close on back of Dow.

text.p: UK shares notched up another closing high on Thursday, encouraged by much weaker-than-expected economic data from the U.S. which spurred the Dow into new high ground.

The leading FTSE 100 index finished 32.6 points higher at 4,757.4, passing the previous closing peak of 4,739.6. But the main UK stock index shied away from the day's best levels and its all-time best of 4,759.3 set on Wednesday.
Gains were broad-based and the Mid-250 was up 38.3 to 4,545.2. "We were struggling a little bit until the U.S. retail sales numbers came in and took us by surprise," said one dealer.
